title: [Discussion]College start date..?
content: If Wednesday is the last date for admission then will the college start on Thursday or next Monday.....?

comments.body:
Prolly on 8th september  
they will do an orientation also right which is mostly on a weekend
Orientation happens only once, if u hadn't joined before orientation there is no orientation for u
Last year the kcet students had a 1 day orientation though
